leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 科研知识图谱-实体规范化与证据链生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 抽取→对齐→融合→推理→版本→评测

queries: [WEB] biomedical named entity recognition models github
[WEB] knowledge graph construction extraction tools github
[WEB] joint entity and relation extraction github

tools.name: knowledge-extraction
tools.one_line_profile: Java library for extracting knowledge graphs from natural language text
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based pipeline that converts natural language text into graph database structures, facilitating knowledge extraction and graph construction.

tools.name: NER-RE
tools.one_line_profile: SpaCy-based pipeline for NER, Entity Linking, and Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive NLP pipeline built on spaCy v3 that performs Named Entity Recognition, Entity Linking to a Knowledge Base, and Relation Extraction to normalize and structure text data.

tools.name: KAZU
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance biomedical Named Entity Recognition and Linking framework
tools.detailed_description: A production-ready biomedical NER and Entity Linking framework developed by AstraZeneca, designed for fast and accurate extraction of biomedical concepts from text.

tools.name: REBEL
tools.one_line_profile: Seq2Seq model for end-to-end Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A sequence-to-sequence model that simplifies relation extraction by translating raw text directly into relation triplets, widely used as a component in knowledge graph construction pipelines.

tools.name: astred
tools.one_line_profile: Library for linguistic comparison and word alignment analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to linguistically compare sentences and analyze word alignments, useful for translation studies and syntactic analysis.

tools.name: spacy_conll
tools.one_line_profile: SpaCy pipeline component for CoNLL-U formatting
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline component for spaCy that adds CoNLL-U properties to documents, facilitating interoperability with standard linguistic data formats.

tools.name: flair
tools.one_line_profile: Full-Length Alternative Isoform analysis of RNA
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the correction, isoform definition, and quantification of full-length RNA sequencing data, specifically designed for nanopore cDNA reads.

tools.name: uniflow
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based unstructured data extraction and cleaning tool
tools.detailed_description: A unified interface for extracting, cleaning, and transforming text from unstructured data sources like PDFs and HTMLs using LLMs, aiding in scientific knowledge base construction.

tools.name: chemdataextractor
tools.one_line_profile: Automated extraction of chemical properties from scientific documents
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for automatically extracting chemical names, properties, and spectra from scientific text, facilitating chemical database construction.

tools.name: tuna
tools.one_line_profile: Hyperparameter optimization for AllenNLP using Ray Tune
tools.detailed_description: A library that integrates Ray Tune with AllenNLP to enable efficient hyperparameter search for NLP models.

tools.name: cogcomp-nlp
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive Java-based NLP library by CogComp
tools.detailed_description: A suite of NLP tools including lemmatizer, NER, POS tagger, and relation extraction modules, providing foundational text processing capabilities.

tools.name: MedCATtrainer
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for training and improving MedCAT biomedical NER models
tools.detailed_description: A web-based interface designed to inspect, improve, and add concepts to MedCAT models, facilitating the creation of high-quality biomedical named entity recognition systems.

tools.name: chem_scanner
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for extracting chemical information from ChemDraw files
tools.detailed_description: A Ruby-based tool for extracting and reusing chemical structure information embedded in ChemDraw files found in scientific documents.

tools.name: RelEx
tools.one_line_profile: Relation Extraction framework built on AllenNLP
tools.detailed_description: A framework developed by DFKI for relation extraction tasks, leveraging AllenNLP to provide a structured approach to training and evaluating RE models.

tools.name: deepsearch-glm
tools.one_line_profile: Graph language models for scientific document knowledge extraction
tools.detailed_description: A library for creating fast graph language models from converted PDF documents, enabling advanced knowledge extraction and Q&A on scientific literature.

tools.name: dewy
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge extraction and retrieval for Gen AI applications
tools.detailed_description: An opinionated framework for knowledge extraction and semantic retrieval, designed to structure information for Generative AI and RAG workflows.

tools.name: NeuroNER
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network-based named-entity recognition tool
tools.detailed_description: A program for named-entity recognition (NER) using neural networks, widely used in biomedical text mining and general NLP tasks. It provides an easy-to-use interface for training and deploying NER models.

tools.name: ReMine
tools.one_line_profile: Open information extraction tool integrating local context and global cohesiveness
tools.detailed_description: A system for Open Information Extraction (OpenIE) that extracts entity relations from large corpora by integrating local context and global cohesiveness, suitable for scientific text mining.

tools.name: uie_pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Universal Information Extraction (UIE) model
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the UIE model originally from PaddleNLP, providing a unified framework for named entity recognition, relation extraction, and event extraction.

tools.name: anago
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence labeling library for NER and POS tagging
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for sequence labeling tasks such as Named-Entity Recognition (NER) and Part-of-Speech (POS) tagging, implementing Bidirectional LSTM-CRF and ELMo models.

tools.name: udify
tools.one_line_profile: Universal Dependencies parsing tool for 75 languages
tools.detailed_description: A single model capable of parsing Universal Dependencies across 75 languages, jointly predicting POS tags, morphology, lemmas, and dependency trees, serving as a foundational tool for multilingual information extraction.

tools.name: Grapher
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge graph extraction from textual descriptions
tools.detailed_description: A tool that implements efficient knowledge graph extraction from textual descriptions, facilitating the construction of structured knowledge from unstructured text.

tools.name: zshot
tools.one_line_profile: Zero and Few shot named entity and relationship recognition library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for zero-shot and few-shot named entity recognition (NER) and relation extraction (RE), compatible with spaCy and Hugging Face pipelines.

tools.name: KnowCoder
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based framework for universal information extraction
tools.detailed_description: A framework that codes structured knowledge into Large Language Models (LLMs) for universal information extraction, enabling extraction of entities, relations, and events via code generation paradigms.

tools.name: USC-DS-RelationExtraction
tools.one_line_profile: Distantly Supervised Relation Extraction system
tools.detailed_description: A C++ implementation for distantly supervised relation extraction, a technique widely used to extract relations from large text corpora using knowledge bases as supervision.

tools.name: AGATHA
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic Graph-mining And Transformer based Hypothesis generation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning system for hypothesis generation that mines knowledge graphs to predict plausible connections, aiding in scientific discovery and evidence chain construction.

tools.name: DeCLUTR
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Contrastive Learning for Unsupervised Textual Representations
tools.detailed_description: A library for training universal sentence embeddings using contrastive learning, useful for entity normalization, clustering, and semantic search in scientific knowledge graphs.

tools.name: seq2rel
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence-to-sequence approach for document-level relation extraction
tools.detailed_description: A library for document-level relation extraction using a sequence-to-sequence paradigm, capable of extracting complex relations from scientific texts.

tools.name: MEL-TNNT
tools.one_line_profile: Metadata Extractor & Loader and NLP-NER Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit comprising a Metadata Extractor & Loader (MEL) and The NLP-NER Toolkit (TNNT), designed to facilitate named entity recognition and metadata management in text processing pipelines.

tools.name: BioDEX
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale biomedical adverse drug event extraction dataset and benchmark
tools.detailed_description: BioDEX is a resource for real-world pharmacovigilance, providing a large-scale dataset and methodology for extracting adverse drug events (ADEs) from biomedical text.

tools.name: deplacy
tools.one_line_profile: CUI-based tree visualizer for Universal Dependencies
tools.detailed_description: A terminal-based visualization tool for displaying Universal Dependencies trees and immediate catena analysis, aiding in linguistic structure analysis.

tools.name: brain-segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tool for brain MRI skull stripping and segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning implementation using U-Net for skull stripping and FLAIR abnormality segmentation in brain MRI scans.

tools.name: allennlp-light
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight version of AllenNLP core modules
tools.detailed_description: A standalone port of AllenNLP's core modules and neural network components, providing essential NLP building blocks with minimum dependencies.

tools.name: MixedEmotions-KG
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge graph creation module from text and emotion data
tools.detailed_description: A tool to create knowledge graphs by processing information from entity extraction, linking, and emotion recognition modules.

tools.name: Relation_Extraction_KGE
tools.one_line_profile: C++ implementation for Knowledge Base Embedding
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library/tool for Knowledge Base Embedding, likely implementing algorithms for relation extraction and link prediction in KGs.

tools.name: SARS-CoV2-mRNA-Assemblies
tools.one_line_profile: Assemblies of putative SARS-CoV2 spike-encoding mRNA sequences
tools.detailed_description: Experimental sequence information and assemblies for the RNA components of Moderna and Pfizer/BioNTech COVID-19 vaccines.

tools.name: medaCy
tools.one_line_profile: Medical text mining and information extraction framework
tools.detailed_description: A medical text mining and information extraction library built on top of spaCy, designed for clinical NLP tasks.

tools.name: UMLS-KG
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to build knowledge graphs from UMLS sources
tools.detailed_description: A utility to load, visualize, and query a knowledge graph built from UMLS Knowledge Sources using Neo4j and Scispacy.

tools.name: NEMO-Corpus
tools.one_line_profile: Hebrew Treebank Named Entity Recognition corpus
tools.detailed_description: A dataset containing Named Entity (NER) annotations for the Hebrew Treebank, including morpheme and token level labels.

tools.name: OneKE
tools.one_line_profile: Large model-based knowledge extraction framework
tools.detailed_description: A knowledge extraction framework leveraging large language models, capable of generalized extraction in Chinese and English across multiple fields.

tools.name: Orphadata_aggregated
tools.one_line_profile: Aggregated dataset from Orphanet knowledge base
tools.detailed_description: Partial extraction of the Orphanet knowledge base on Rare Diseases, provided as aggregated files for research.

tools.name: DOCRED-FE
tools.one_line_profile: Document-level fine-grained entity and relation extraction dataset
tools.detailed_description: A dataset and associated codes for document-level fine-grained entity and relation extraction, presented at ICASSP 2023.

tools.name: PaddleNLP
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive NLP library based on PaddlePaddle
tools.detailed_description: A powerful NLP library providing easy-to-use interfaces for LLMs and SLMs, including a rich model zoo for various information extraction tasks.

tools.name: docai
tools.one_line_profile: Library for structured information extraction from documents
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for extracting structured information from various document formats, facilitating document AI workflows.

tools.name: transformer-srl
tools.one_line_profile: BERT-based Semantic Role Labeling implementation
tools.detailed_description: A reimplementation of a BERT-based model for Semantic Role Labeling (SRL), including predicate disambiguation, serving as a robust extraction tool.

tools.name: transformers-embedder
tools.one_line_profile: Word-level Transformer layer library
tools.detailed_description: A library providing a Word Level Transformer layer based on PyTorch and Hugging Face Transformers, useful for building NLP models.

tools.name: GDAP
tools.one_line_profile: Prompt-based framework for disentangled event argument extraction
tools.detailed_description: A simple yet effective event extraction framework that uses prompts to generate disentangled arguments, addressing the issue of argument overlap and interaction in event extraction tasks.

tools.name: TestNER
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for testing and improving Named Entity Recognition models
tools.detailed_description: A software testing toolkit designed to evaluate the robustness of NER models and improve their performance through targeted testing strategies.

tools.name: GIT
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based Interaction Model with Tracker for Document-level Event Extraction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a heterogeneous graph-based interaction model with a tracker for extracting events from documents, capturing global interactions among events.

tools.name: TSAR
tools.one_line_profile: Two-Stream AMR-enhanced Model for Event Argument Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A model leveraging Abstract Meaning Representation (AMR) to enhance document-level event argument extraction through a two-stream approach.

tools.name: KEEL
tools.one_line_profile: Software tool for Knowledge Extraction based on Evolutionary Learning
tools.detailed_description: An open source Java software tool to assess evolutionary algorithms for Data Mining problems including regression, classification, clustering, and pattern mining.

tools.name: ReLiK
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate Entity Linking and Relation Extraction toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A retriever-reader pipeline for fast and accurate entity linking and relation extraction, optimized for efficiency on academic budgets.

tools.name: OpenNRE_for_Chinese
tools.one_line_profile: OpenNRE implementation for Chinese relation extraction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the OpenNRE framework specifically adapted for Chinese open relation extraction tasks.

tools.name: CORD-19-ANN
tools.one_line_profile: Semantic search tool for COVID-19 CORD-19 dataset
tools.detailed_description: An Approximate Nearest Neighbor (ANN) search tool using SBERT embeddings to explore and retrieve relevant documents from the COVID-19 Open Research Dataset (CORD-19).

tools.name: Attention-Based-BiLSTM-RE
tools.one_line_profile: Attention-Based BiLSTM for Relation Classification
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow implementation of Attention-Based Bidirectional Long Short-Term Memory Networks for Relation Classification, serving as a reference implementation for this classic architecture.

tools.name: MRC-NER
tools.one_line_profile: Unified MRC framework for Flat and Nested NER
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Machine Reading Comprehension (MRC) framework that unifies flat and nested Named Entity Recognition tasks.

tools.name: pytorch-pcnn
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of PCNN for relation extraction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the Piecewise Convolutional Neural Networks (PCNN) model for supervised relation extraction.

tools.name: pytorch-relation-extraction
tools.one_line_profile: Distant supervised relation extraction models in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: Implementations of distant supervised relation extraction models including PCNN-MIL and PCNN+ATT.

tools.name: OpenNRE-PyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Relation Extraction library in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Neural Relation Extraction (OpenNRE), providing a framework for training and evaluating RE models.

tools.name: ArabicNER
tools.one_line_profile: Nested Named Entity Recognition for Arabic
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing nested named entity recognition specifically designed for the Arabic language.

tools.name: DocEE
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for document-level event extraction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit containing implementations of state-of-the-art models for document-level event extraction.

tools.name: BiLSTM-Tree-RE
tools.one_line_profile: Relation Classification using BiLSTM on Sequences and Tree Structures
tools.detailed_description: TensorFlow implementation of end-to-end relation extraction using LSTMs on sequences and tree structures, and shortest dependency paths.

tools.name: iFeatureOmega-CLI
tools.one_line_profile: CLI tool for biological sequence feature extraction
tools.detailed_description: Command-line interface for iFeatureOmega, a platform for generating, analyzing, and visualizing representations for biological sequences, 3D structures, and ligands.

tools.name: iFeatureOmega-GUI
tools.one_line_profile: GUI platform for biological sequence feature extraction
tools.detailed_description: Graphical User Interface for iFeatureOmega, facilitating the generation and analysis of features for biological sequences and structures without programming.

tools.name: CLEVE
tools.one_line_profile: Contrastive Pre-training for Event Extraction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a contrastive pre-training framework for improving event extraction performance.

tools.name: MAVEN-ERE
tools.one_line_profile: Unified dataset and code for Event Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: Source code and dataset for a unified large-scale framework handling event coreference, temporal, causal, and subevent relation extraction.

tools.name: OmniEvent
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive modular event extraction toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A unified and modular toolkit for event extraction, supporting various paradigms and models to facilitate research and deployment.

tools.name: CrossLingualContextualEmb
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-Lingual Alignment of Contextual Word Embeddings
tools.detailed_description: Tools for aligning contextual word embeddings across different languages, facilitating cross-lingual NLP tasks.

tools.name: MRC4ERE_plus
tools.one_line_profile: MRC-based framework for Joint Entity-Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Machine Reading Comprehension framework for joint entity and relation extraction, focusing on effective question generation.

tools.name: PharmaCoNER-Tagger
tools.one_line_profile: Neural NER tagger for Spanish medical texts
tools.detailed_description: A Neural Named Entity Recognition program targeting domain adaptation for Spanish medical texts, based on NeuroNER.

tools.name: MatSciE
tools.one_line_profile: Automated IE tool for Material Science documents
tools.detailed_description: An automated tool designed for information extraction specifically from Material Science scientific documents.

tools.name: RAAT
tools.one_line_profile: Relation-Augmented Attention Transformer for Event Extraction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the RAAT model, which uses relation-augmented attention transformers for relation modeling in document-level event extraction.

tools.name: Context-Aware-RE
tools.one_line_profile: Context-Aware Representations for KB Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of context-aware representations for relation extraction in knowledge bases, as presented at EMNLP 2017.

tools.name: ieturk
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation tool for Information Extraction
tools.detailed_description: An intuitive annotation tool for Information Extraction and Named Entity Recognition, supporting localturk and Amazon Mechanical Turk workflows.

tools.name: Kairos
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific conference metadata extraction engine
tools.detailed_description: A system combining a focused crawler and information extraction engine to harvest and extract metadata from scientific conference websites.

tools.name: OpenJERE
tools.one_line_profile: Joint Entity and Relation Extraction model
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Seq2Seq model for Joint Entity and Relation Extraction, designed to minimize exposure bias.

tools.name: pytorch_multi_head_selection_re
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-head selection for Joint Entity-Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the multi-head selection problem approach for joint entity recognition and relation extraction, supporting BERT.

tools.name: xf_event_extraction_system
tools.one_line_profile: Complete event extraction system (Challenge Top 1)
tools.detailed_description: A complete event extraction system and solution that won 1st place in the iFlytek 2020 Event Extraction Challenge.

tools.name: EntityRelationExtraction-Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for entity and relation extraction using BiLSTM, CRF, and BERT
tools.detailed_description: A complete pipeline implementation for named entity recognition and relation extraction tasks, integrating BiLSTM, CRF, and BERT models for information extraction from text.

tools.name: Multilingual_Event_Extraction
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for ACE-style event extraction on English, Chinese, and Spanish texts
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based solver for performing event extraction tasks following the ACE (Automatic Content Extraction) schema, supporting multiple languages including English, Chinese, and Spanish.

tools.name: WhisperNER
tools.one_line_profile: Unified model for open named entity recognition and speech recognition
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of WhisperNER, a model that unifies Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) and Named Entity Recognition (NER), allowing for entity extraction directly from speech or text.

tools.name: DeepEventMine
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end neural nested event extraction system for biomedical texts
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based system designed for extracting nested events from biomedical literature, capable of handling complex event structures and achieving state-of-the-art performance on biomedical benchmarks.

tools.name: Unsupervised_NER
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised named entity recognition prototype using pretrained BERT models
tools.detailed_description: A self-supervised Named Entity Recognition tool that utilizes pretrained BERT models without fine-tuning to extract entities, particularly focused on biomedical datasets.

tools.name: pytorch_neural_crf
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of CRF layers for named entity recognition models
tools.detailed_description: A robust PyTorch implementation of Conditional Random Fields (CRF), commonly used on top of LSTM or BERT models for sequence labeling tasks like Named Entity Recognition.

tools.name: AllenNLP
tools.one_line_profile: Research library for designing and evaluating deep learning models for NLP
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive open-source NLP research library built on PyTorch, providing high-level abstractions and reference implementations for a wide range of NLP tasks including information extraction, semantic parsing, and question answering.

tools.name: AllenNLP Models
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of state-of-the-art NLP models implemented with AllenNLP
tools.detailed_description: The official repository containing implementations of core NLP models supported by AllenNLP, including models for NER, constituency parsing, dependency parsing, and semantic role labeling.

tools.name: AllenNLP Semparse
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for building semantic parsers and neural module networks
tools.detailed_description: A specialized library within the AllenNLP ecosystem for constructing semantic parsers, which translate natural language into machine-executable logical forms or SQL.

tools.name: AllenTune
tools.one_line_profile: Hyperparameter search and optimization tool for AllenNLP models
tools.detailed_description: A library that integrates Ray Tune with AllenNLP to facilitate distributed hyperparameter search and optimization for NLP models.

tools.name: OpenIE Standalone
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable open information extraction system for extracting relational tuples
tools.detailed_description: A standalone Scala-based tool for Open Information Extraction (OpenIE), capable of extracting relational tuples (argument, relation, argument) from massive web-scale text corpora.

tools.name: scispacy
tools.one_line_profile: SpaCy pipeline and models specifically designed for biomedical and scientific text
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library containing spaCy pipelines and models optimized for processing biomedical, scientific, and clinical text, including specialized tokenizers, NER models, and entity linkers.

tools.name: Amazon Weak NER Needle
tools.one_line_profile: Named entity recognition model training with weak supervision
tools.detailed_description: A tool/solver for training Named Entity Recognition (NER) models using a combination of small strongly labeled data and large weakly labeled data, developed by Amazon Science.

tools.name: MindMapper
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for extracting knowledge graphs and performing network analysis using LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) to extract entities and relations from text, construct knowledge graphs, and perform network analysis.

tools.name: lightspeedGPT
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput wrapper for GPT models to perform tasks like NER on large datasets
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to process unlimited size inputs using GPT-3.5/4 via multithreading, specifically optimized for tasks like Named Entity Recognition and information extraction on large documents.

tools.name: sift
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for extracting structured knowledge from web data
tools.detailed_description: A library/tool for performing knowledge extraction from web pages, facilitating the conversion of unstructured web data into structured formats.

tools.name: biome-text
tools.one_line_profile: NLP library for training and deploying custom extraction models
tools.detailed_description: A library built on AllenNLP and Transformers to facilitate the training and deployment of custom NLP models for tasks like entity extraction and classification.

tools.name: T-NER
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based Named Entity Recognition library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for named entity recognition (NER) model training and evaluation, featuring easy-to-use interfaces for transformer-based models and cross-domain evaluation capabilities.

tools.name: GraphRAG-rs
tools.one_line_profile: Rust implementation of GraphRAG for knowledge graph construction
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance Rust implementation of the GraphRAG methodology, designed to build knowledge graphs from documents and support retrieval augmented generation tasks.

tools.name: TweetNLP
tools.one_line_profile: NLP toolkit specialized for social media text analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing state-of-the-art language models for analyzing tweets, including tasks such as named entity recognition, sentiment analysis, and emoji prediction.

tools.name: seqeval
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for sequence labeling tasks
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework specifically designed for evaluating sequence labeling tasks such as named entity recognition (NER) and POS tagging, providing standard metrics like F1 score.

tools.name: CLTK
tools.one_line_profile: Natural language processing toolkit for classical languages
tools.detailed_description: The Classical Language Toolkit (CLTK) is a Python library offering NLP support for historical and classical languages, including tokenization, lemmatization, and entity recognition.

tools.name: semantic-llama
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based semantic information extraction tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool that leverages large language models to extract structured semantic information from text, developed by researchers at LBNL.

tools.name: GPT4IE
tools.one_line_profile: GPT-based Information Extraction toolkit
tools.detailed_description: An open-source toolkit designed to leverage GPT models for various information extraction tasks, simplifying the process of extracting structured data from text.

tools.name: am-parser
tools.one_line_profile: AM dependency parser implementation in AllenNLP
tools.detailed_description: A modular implementation of an AM (Apply-Modify) dependency parser built on top of the AllenNLP framework, used for linguistic structure analysis.

tools.name: TextRank
tools.one_line_profile: Python implementation of TextRank for keyword extraction
tools.detailed_description: A widely used Python implementation of the TextRank algorithm for automatic keyword extraction and text summarization.

tools.name: crosslingual-coreference
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-lingual coreference resolution wrapper for AllenNLP and spaCy
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a multi-lingual approach to Coreference Resolution using AllenNLP models, wrapped for easy integration with the spaCy NLP pipeline.

tools.name: flaiR
tools.one_line_profile: R wrapper for the Flair NLP library
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides an interface to the state-of-the-art Flair NLP library (Python), enabling R users to perform named entity recognition, part-of-speech tagging, and text classification.

tools.name: DeepPavlov NER
tools.one_line_profile: Named Entity Recognition component of the DeepPavlov framework
tools.detailed_description: A dedicated repository/component for Named Entity Recognition within the DeepPavlov conversational AI framework, providing pre-trained models and pipelines for extracting entities from text.

tools.name: rsnltk
tools.one_line_profile: Rust-based Natural Language Toolkit with Python bindings
tools.detailed_description: A Natural Language Processing toolkit written in Rust, offering high-performance text processing capabilities with Python bindings for integration into Python-based research workflows.

tools.name: FOX
tools.one_line_profile: Federated Knowledge Extraction Framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for Federated Knowledge Extraction that integrates various Named Entity Recognition and Relation Extraction algorithms to extract RDF triples from natural language text.

tools.name: dket
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Knowledge Extraction from Text library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for Deep Knowledge Extraction from text, facilitating the extraction of structured information for knowledge graph construction.

tools.name: Bio-Epidemiology-NER
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical entity recognition tool
tools.detailed_description: A specialized Named Entity Recognition tool designed to recognize bio-medical entities from text corpora, useful for epidemiological research and biomedical text mining.

tools.name: dygiepp
tools.one_line_profile: Span-based system for entity, relation, and event extraction
tools.detailed_description: A robust, span-based information extraction system capable of performing named entity recognition, relation extraction, and event extraction jointly. It serves as a reference implementation for several state-of-the-art IE models.

tools.name: pytorch-bert-crf-ner
tools.one_line_profile: BERT-CRF based Named Entity Recognition for Korean
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of a Named Entity Recognition model using KoBERT and CRF, serving as a practical tool for extracting entities from Korean text.

tools.name: TextEE
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark toolkit for Event Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A standardized, fair, and reproducible benchmark toolkit for evaluating event extraction approaches, providing unified data processing and model evaluation interfaces.

tools.name: SpikeX
tools.one_line_profile: SpaCy pipes for Knowledge Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A collection of spaCy pipes and extensions designed to facilitate Knowledge Extraction tasks, including pattern matching and graph-based extraction.

tools.name: productner
tools.one_line_profile: Product categorization and NER tool
tools.detailed_description: A library providing algorithms to categorize products and perform named entity recognition on words in product descriptions, useful for e-commerce knowledge graph construction.

tools.name: spacy-stanza
tools.one_line_profile: Stanza wrapper for spaCy pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper library that allows using the latest Stanza (StanfordNLP) research models directly within the spaCy NLP pipeline, combining Stanza's accuracy with spaCy's usability.

tools.name: GLiNER2
tools.one_line_profile: Unified Schema-Based Information Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for Generalist and Lightweight Named Entity Recognition (GLiNER) that enables unified schema-based information extraction, allowing for flexible and efficient entity extraction across various domains.

tools.name: cocoNLP
tools.one_line_profile: Chinese information extraction tool
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Chinese information extraction tool capable of extracting various entities such as names, times, locations, and phone numbers from text.

tools.name: Flair
tools.one_line_profile: State-of-the-art Natural Language Processing framework
tools.detailed_description: A powerful and simple NLP framework that provides state-of-the-art models for named entity recognition (NER), part-of-speech tagging (PoS), and text classification, often used for building knowledge extraction pipelines.

tools.name: flair-lms
tools.one_line_profile: Language Models extension for Flair library
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing language models and integration scripts for the Flair NLP library, extending its capabilities with pre-trained embeddings and models.

tools.name: BenchIE
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive evaluation framework for Open Information Extraction systems
tools.detailed_description: BenchIE is a benchmarking framework designed to evaluate Open Information Extraction (OIE) systems. It provides metrics and protocols to assess the quality of extracted facts, facilitating comparative analysis of different OIE models.

tools.name: LSTM-CRF Tagger
tools.one_line_profile: Classic Named Entity Recognition tool using LSTM and CRF
tools.detailed_description: A standalone implementation of the LSTM-CRF architecture for Named Entity Recognition (NER). It serves as a robust baseline and tool for sequence tagging tasks in NLP research.

tools.name: T-REx
tools.one_line_profile: Large scale alignment pipeline for Relation Extraction datasets
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline tool for aligning natural language text with Knowledge Base triples (Wikidata). It is used to generate large-scale datasets for relation extraction and natural language generation tasks.

tools.name: HanLP
tools.one_line_profile: Multilingual NLP library for extraction and parsing
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Natural Language Processing library supporting multiple languages. It provides efficient tools for lexical analysis, named entity recognition, dependency parsing, and text classification.

tools.name: Chatbot NER
tools.one_line_profile: Named Entity Recognition library for conversational AI
tools.detailed_description: A specialized Named Entity Recognition library designed for chatbots and conversational agents. It focuses on extracting entities from short, informal, and conversational text inputs.

tools.name: AllenNLP Optuna
tools.one_line_profile: Hyperparameter optimization plugin for AllenNLP
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AllenNLP framework that integrates Optuna, enabling efficient hyperparameter optimization for Natural Language Processing models, including those used for extraction tasks.

tools.name: GoLLIE
tools.one_line_profile: Guideline-following Large Language Model for Information Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A Large Language Model fine-tuned to follow annotation guidelines for Information Extraction. It allows for zero-shot extraction of entities and relations by defining tasks through guidelines.

tools.name: EventMiner
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for event extraction from text
tools.detailed_description: A software pipeline for extracting events from unstructured text, developed by the HLTCOE. It processes text to identify event triggers and arguments.

tools.name: Golden Horse
tools.one_line_profile: Named Entity Recognition for Chinese social media
tools.detailed_description: A Named Entity Recognition tool specifically optimized for Chinese social media text (e.g., Weibo). It addresses the challenges of noisy, informal text in entity extraction.

tools.name: HuNER
tools.one_line_profile: Named Entity Recognition for biomedical entities
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Named Entity Recognition tool tailored for the biomedical domain. It is designed to extract specific biomedical entities from scientific literature.

tools.name: HMTL
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical Multi-Task Learning for NLP
tools.detailed_description: A neural network framework for Hierarchical Multi-Task Learning (HMTL) based on PyTorch and AllenNLP. It enables the simultaneous training of multiple NLP tasks, such as NER, relation extraction, and mention detection.

tools.name: Dedoc
tools.one_line_profile: Universal document parsing and structure extraction library
tools.detailed_description: A library for automating document parsing and content extraction. It converts various document formats (PDF, DOCX, HTML) into a uniform structure, extracting text, tables, and metadata, which is essential for downstream IE and KG tasks.

tools.name: Zero-Shot Entity Linking
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for Zero-Shot Entity Linking with bi-encoders
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for Zero-Shot Entity Linking, enabling the linking of entities to a knowledge base without domain-specific training. It includes implementations for hard negative mining and entity encoding.

tools.name: GLiREL
tools.one_line_profile: Generalist and Lightweight Model for Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A generalist model for Relation Extraction that can extract arbitrary relationship types from text. It is designed to be lightweight and applicable to various domains without extensive retraining.

tools.name: Kindred
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical relation extraction package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package specifically for biomedical relation extraction. It uses a supervised learning approach to identify relationships between biomedical entities in text.

tools.name: TEES
tools.one_line_profile: Turku Event Extraction System for biomedical text mining
tools.detailed_description: A renowned biomedical event extraction system that detects complex events and relations in scientific literature, widely used in BioNLP shared tasks.

tools.name: NCRF++
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Sequence Labeling Toolkit for NER and POS tagging
tools.detailed_description: A flexible and efficient neural sequence labeling toolkit that supports various character/word-level neural encoders (LSTM/CNN) and CRF decoding for tasks like Named Entity Recognition.

tools.name: Biaffine NER
tools.one_line_profile: Named Entity Recognition model treating NER as dependency parsing
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of NER that reformulates the task as dependency parsing using biaffine attention mechanisms, offering high performance on nested and flat entities.

tools.name: FLAIR (Retina)
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation Language-Image model for fundus image understanding
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model designed for analyzing retinal fundus images by integrating language and image modalities, useful for medical diagnosis and analysis.

tools.name: ACES
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic Cohort Extraction System for Event-Streams
tools.detailed_description: A system for automatically extracting patient cohorts from electronic health record event streams, facilitating clinical research and data analysis.

tools.name: BERT-NER (Pytorch)
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of BERT for Named Entity Recognition
tools.detailed_description: A widely used PyTorch implementation for fine-tuning BERT models on Named Entity Recognition tasks, serving as a standard tool for NER.

tools.name: BERT-NER-TF
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow 2.0 implementation of BERT for Named Entity Recognition
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow 2.0 implementation for performing Named Entity Recognition using BERT embeddings, providing a tool for NER tasks in TF environments.

tools.name: BiLSTM-CNN-NER
tools.one_line_profile: Bi-directional LSTM and CNN architecture for Named Entity Recognition
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the classic BiLSTM-CNN-CRF architecture for Named Entity Recognition, serving as a baseline tool for sequence labeling.

tools.name: clinspacy
tools.one_line_profile: Clinical Natural Language Processing pipeline for R
tools.detailed_description: An R package that interfaces with spaCy, scispacy, and medspacy to perform clinical natural language processing tasks such as entity recognition and negation detection.

tools.name: GROBID
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents
tools.detailed_description: A powerful machine learning library for extracting, parsing, and restructuring raw documents (PDFs) into structured XML/TEI, focusing on technical and scientific publications.

tools.name: StrainFLAIR
tools.one_line_profile: Strain-level abundance estimation in metagenomic samples
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics tool for estimating strain-level abundances in metagenomic samples using variation graphs, aiding in microbiome analysis.

tools.name: OpenIE
tools.one_line_profile: Web-scale Open Information Extraction system
tools.detailed_description: A system for extracting relational tuples from text without requiring a pre-specified schema, designed for web-scale information extraction.

tools.name: ReVerb
tools.one_line_profile: Web-Scale Open Information Extraction tool
tools.detailed_description: An open information extraction tool that identifies and extracts binary relationships from English sentences, optimized for web-scale processing.

tools.name: BERT-NER (Google BERT)
tools.one_line_profile: BERT-based Named Entity Recognition implementation
tools.detailed_description: A popular implementation of Named Entity Recognition using Google's BERT model, widely used as a baseline and tool for extracting entities from text.

tools.name: Clinical-NER
tools.one_line_profile: Named Entity Recognition for Chinese Electronic Medical Records
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for extracting named entities from Chinese electronic medical records (EMR), supporting clinical informatics research.

tools.name: JEREX
tools.one_line_profile: Joint Entity-Level Relation Extractor
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation for joint entity and relation extraction, capable of handling multi-label relations and entity overlaps.

tools.name: SpERT
tools.one_line_profile: Span-based Entity and Relation Transformer
tools.detailed_description: A span-based joint entity and relation extraction model using BERT, widely used for extracting structured information from text.

tools.name: NERRE
tools.one_line_profile: Structured information extraction from scientific text
tools.detailed_description: A tool for extracting structured information (entities and relations) from scientific texts, developed by LBNL, utilizing large language models.

tools.name: NER-BERT-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch solution for Named Entity Recognition using BERT
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based solution for Named Entity Recognition tasks leveraging pre-trained BERT models, providing a reusable pipeline for NER.

tools.name: Open Entity Relation Extraction
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge triple extraction based on dependency syntax
tools.detailed_description: A tool for extracting knowledge triples and constructing knowledge bases from open-domain text using dependency syntax analysis.

tools.name: OpenIE-Spider
tools.one_line_profile: Web corpus information extraction spider
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to crawl and extract information from web corpora using Open Information Extraction techniques, suitable for building large-scale knowledge bases.

tools.name: bio-ner
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical Named Entity Recognition and Normalization library
tools.detailed_description: A library for Biomedical Named Entity Recognition and Normalization of Diseases, Chemicals, and Genetic entity classes using state-of-the-art models.

tools.name: Event-Extraction
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive collection of event extraction models and implementations
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit summarizing and implementing various event extraction methods including Chinese, Open Domain, Cross-lingual, and Few-shot event extraction using models like DMCNN, JMEE, and PLMEE.

tools.name: NER-LSTM-CRF
tools.one_line_profile: Easy-to-use Bi-LSTM+CRF toolkit for Named Entity Recognition
tools.detailed_description: A TensorFlow-based toolkit implementing the Bi-LSTM+CRF model for Named Entity Recognition tasks, designed for ease of use.

tools.name: BaikeInfoExtraction
tools.one_line_profile: Structured information extraction tool for Chinese encyclopedias
tools.detailed_description: A tool for extracting structured infobox information from Chinese encyclopedias (Baidu Baike, Hudong Baike, Sogou Baike) to support knowledge fusion.

tools.name: CausalityEventExtraction
tools.one_line_profile: Causality event extraction and knowledge graph construction tool
tools.detailed_description: A project for extracting causal events based on explicit patterns and large-scale corpora, enabling the construction of causality event knowledge graphs.

tools.name: ComplexEventExtraction
tools.one_line_profile: Chinese complex event extraction and logic graph construction tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for extracting Chinese compound events (conditional, causal, sequential, reversal) based on explicit patterns to form an event logic graph.

tools.name: EventTriplesExtraction
tools.one_line_profile: Event triple extraction tool based on dependency parsing
tools.detailed_description: A tool for extracting event triples using dependency parsing and semantic role labeling, useful for constructing event chains and topic graphs.

tools.name: MedicalNamedEntityRecognition
tools.one_line_profile: Medical Named Entity Recognition tool for Chinese EMRs
tools.detailed_description: A medical NER implementation using Bi-LSTM+CRF with character embeddings, originally for CCKS2017 but widely used as a baseline tool for Chinese electronic medical records.

tools.name: PersonRelationKnowledgeGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Chinese person relation extraction and knowledge graph tool
tools.detailed_description: A project for constructing Chinese person relation graphs, including relation extraction based on remote supervision and bootstrapping methods.

tools.name: transformers-ner
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch NER toolkit using Transformers
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based Named Entity Recognition toolkit leveraging Transformer models, providing a standard interface for NER tasks.

tools.name: ace2005chinese_preprocess
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing scripts for ACE 2005 Chinese corpus
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool for preprocessing the ACE 2005 corpus specifically for Event Extraction tasks, facilitating data preparation.

tools.name: BERT-NER-Pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Chinese NER toolkit using BERT
tools.detailed_description: A widely used toolkit for Chinese Named Entity Recognition implementing BERT with various decoding layers (Softmax, CRF, Span).

tools.name: DeepIE
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Learning toolkit for Information Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive deep learning framework/toolkit designed for various Information Extraction tasks, including entity and relation extraction.

tools.name: Odinson
tools.one_line_profile: Fast rule-based information extraction framework
tools.detailed_description: A powerful and highly optimized open-source framework for rule-based information extraction, featuring a pattern language and near real-time runtime system.

tools.name: named_entity_recognition
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Chinese NER model implementations
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit containing implementations of various models for Chinese Named Entity Recognition, including HMM, CRF, BiLSTM, and BiLSTM+CRF.

tools.name: IEPY
tools.one_line_profile: Information Extraction framework in Python
tools.detailed_description: An open-source tool for Information Extraction focused on Relation Extraction, providing a framework for building custom extraction pipelines.

tools.name: Malaya
tools.one_line_profile: Natural Language Toolkit for Malaysian language
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Natural Language Toolkit for the Malaysian language, including modules for entity extraction and other NLP tasks.

tools.name: brain-segmentation-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: U-Net implementation for brain MRI segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of U-Net specifically designed for FLAIR abnormality segmentation in brain MRI datasets.

tools.name: pytorch-truecaser
tools.one_line_profile: Neural truecasing tool for NLP preprocessing
tools.detailed_description: A simple neural truecaser implemented in PyTorch and AllenNLP, useful for text preprocessing in NLP pipelines.

tools.name: Conversation-Knowledge-Mining-Solution-Accelerator
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge mining solution accelerator using Azure AI
tools.detailed_description: A solution accelerator leveraging Azure AI for extracting insights, key phrases, and topics from conversational data, enabling knowledge mining.

tools.name: Presidio Research
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation and development package for PII detection models
tools.detailed_description: A Python package containing data-science tasks for developing, evaluating, and improving PII (Personally Identifiable Information) recognizers within the Presidio ecosystem. It facilitates the creation of synthetic datasets and the benchmarking of PII detection models.

tools.name: VERT
tools.one_line_profile: Versatile Entity Recognition and Disambiguation Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit and collection of code/datasets for entity recognition and disambiguation, developed by Microsoft Research Asia. It supports research into versatile entity linking and knowledge extraction tasks.

tools.name: MALLET
tools.one_line_profile: Machine Learning for Language Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based package for statistical natural language processing, document classification, clustering, topic modeling, information extraction, and other machine learning applications to text.

tools.name: TweebankNLP
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained NLP toolkit for Social Media (Tweets)
tools.detailed_description: An off-the-shelf pre-trained NLP toolkit specifically designed for processing tweets. It supports Named Entity Recognition (NER), tokenization, lemmatization, POS tagging, and dependency parsing on social media text.

tools.name: MITIE
tools.one_line_profile: Library and tools for information extraction
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library (with Python, R, Java, C bindings) for information extraction, providing state-of-the-art named entity recognition and binary relation detection capabilities.

tools.name: spacy-clausie
tools.one_line_profile: ClausIE information extraction system for spaCy
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the ClausIE (Clause-based Open Information Extraction) system, integrated with the spaCy NLP library to extract propositions and relations from text.

tools.name: infoboxer
tools.one_line_profile: Wikipedia information extraction library
tools.detailed_description: A Ruby library designed to extract structured data from Wikipedia Infoboxes and other semantic parts of MediaWiki pages, useful for constructing knowledge bases from Wikipedia.

tools.name: ner-lstm
tools.one_line_profile: Bi-LSTM based Named Entity Recognition
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Named Entity Recognition using multilayered bidirectional LSTMs. It serves as a reusable baseline or tool for training custom NER models.

tools.name: SalIE
tools.one_line_profile: Salient Open Information Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A Java implementation of SalIE, a system for Open Information Extraction that focuses on extracting salient facts from text.

tools.name: spacy-lookup
tools.one_line_profile: Dictionary-based Named Entity Recognition for spaCy
tools.detailed_description: A spaCy extension that performs Named Entity Recognition based on provided dictionaries or lists of terms, useful for extracting specific entities not covered by statistical models.

tools.name: holmes-extractor
tools.one_line_profile: Predicate logic based information extraction
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for information extraction from English and German texts. It uses predicate logic to analyze sentence structures and extract relationships.

tools.name: KGPool
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic Knowledge Graph Context Selection for Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the KGPool model (ACL 2021) for relation extraction, which dynamically selects relevant context from knowledge graphs to improve extraction performance.

tools.name: LSR
tools.one_line_profile: Latent Structure Refinement for Document-Level Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of the LSR model (ACL 2020) for document-level relation extraction, which induces latent document-level graphs to support reasoning.

tools.name: AIONER
tools.one_line_profile: All-in-One Named Entity Recognition
tools.detailed_description: A Named Entity Recognition tool developed by NCBI, likely focused on biomedical entities given the organization's domain.

tools.name: llm-graph-builder
tools.one_line_profile: Neo4j graph construction from unstructured data using LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A tool by Neo4j Labs that leverages Large Language Models (LLMs) to extract entities and relationships from unstructured text and construct a Neo4j knowledge graph.

tools.name: AREkit
tools.one_line_profile: Document level Attitude and Relation Extraction toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed for sampling and processing large text collections for document-level attitude and relation extraction tasks, supporting machine learning workflows.

tools.name: FREDo
tools.one_line_profile: Few-Shot Document-Level Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Few-Shot Document-Level Relation Extraction model (NAACL 2022), providing tools to perform relation extraction with limited labeled data.

tools.name: GLRE
tools.one_line_profile: Global-to-Local Neural Networks for Document-Level Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the GLRE model (EMNLP 2020) for document-level relation extraction, utilizing global and local representations.

tools.name: gr-nlp-toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Greek NLP toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive NLP toolkit specifically for the Greek language, supporting Named Entity Recognition (NER), Dependency Parsing, POS tagging, and transliteration.

tools.name: ace2005-preprocessing
tools.one_line_profile: ACE 2005 corpus preprocessing for Event Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools and scripts for preprocessing the ACE 2005 corpus, a standard dataset for Event Extraction research, converting it into formats suitable for model training.

tools.name: bert-event-extraction
tools.one_line_profile: BERT-based Event Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation for Event Extraction tasks using BERT, specifically tailored for the ACE 2005 corpus.

tools.name: DialogRE
tools.one_line_profile: Dialogue-Based Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing the DialogRE dataset and baseline models for relation extraction in dialogue settings, serving as a benchmark tool for this specific task.

tools.name: blabla
tools.one_line_profile: Linguistic feature extraction library
tools.detailed_description: A library for extracting linguistic features from text, useful for clinical linguistics and other NLP analyses.

tools.name: PtrNetDecoding4JERE
tools.one_line_profile: Pointer Network for Joint Entity and Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of an encoder-decoder architecture with pointer networks for joint entity and relation extraction (AAAI 2020).

tools.name: trapper
tools.one_line_profile: NLP transformer models wrapper and toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A library that provides a modular design and consistent APIs for state-of-the-art NLP transformer models, facilitating their use in information extraction and other tasks.

tools.name: PDF-Extract-Kit
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive Toolkit for PDF Content Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A high-quality toolkit for extracting content from PDFs, including layout analysis, formula detection, and table extraction. Essential for mining scientific literature.

tools.name: open-semantic-entity-search-api
tools.one_line_profile: REST API for named entity extraction and linking
tools.detailed_description: An open-source REST API for named entity extraction, linking, disambiguation, and reconciliation, facilitating semantic tagging of documents using knowledge graphs.

tools.name: open-semantic-etl
tools.one_line_profile: ETL tools for semantic document processing
tools.detailed_description: A set of ETL tools for crawling, text extraction, OCR, and named entity recognition, designed to enrich data for semantic search and knowledge graph ingestion.

tools.name: open-semantic-search
tools.one_line_profile: Semantic Search Engine and Text Mining Platform
tools.detailed_description: An integrated research tool and platform for searching, browsing, and analyzing large document collections using semantic search, text mining, and named entity recognition.

tools.name: dehyphen
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for dehyphenation of broken text extracted from PDFs
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to reconstruct words broken by hyphenation in text extracted from PDF documents, facilitating better downstream NLP tasks like entity extraction.

tools.name: stanford-openie-python
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for Stanford Open Information Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface to the Stanford OpenIE library, enabling easy extraction of open-domain relation triples from text for knowledge graph construction.

tools.name: StanzaGraphs
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based summary and keyword extractor using Stanza
tools.detailed_description: A multilingual system that uses Stanza for dependency parsing and TextGraphs for graph-based keyword and summary extraction, supporting question answering.

tools.name: qKnow
tools.one_line_profile: Enterprise knowledge graph platform
tools.detailed_description: An open-source platform for knowledge graph construction, fusion, and visualization, providing tools for structured knowledge extraction and management.

tools.name: DeepSeg
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for brain tumor segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A deep neural network framework designed for automatic segmentation of brain tumors from MRI FLAIR images, supporting medical imaging analysis.

tools.name: OLLIE
tools.one_line_profile: Open Language Learning for Information Extraction
tools.detailed_description: An open information extraction system that extracts binary relations from dependency parse graphs, improving upon ReVerb by handling non-verb mediated relations.

tools.name: holmes-extractor
tools.one_line_profile: Predicate logic-based information extraction
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for information extraction from English and German texts that utilizes predicate logic and dependency parsing to analyze semantic structures.

tools.name: Chatito
tools.one_line_profile: DSL for generating NLP training datasets
tools.detailed_description: A tool using a simple DSL to generate synthetic training datasets for Named Entity Recognition (NER) and text classification tasks, aiding in model training.

tools.name: OpenIE-Persian
tools.one_line_profile: Open information extraction for Persian
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based open information extraction tool specifically designed for the Persian language, enabling relation extraction from Persian web text.

tools.name: BNLP
tools.one_line_profile: Natural language processing toolkit for Bengali
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive NLP toolkit for the Bengali language, including tokenization, embedding, POS tagging, and NER capabilities.

tools.name: ThamizhiMorph
tools.one_line_profile: Tamil morphological analyser and generator
tools.detailed_description: A tool for morphological analysis and generation of Tamil words, supporting linguistic research and NLP applications for the Tamil language.

tools.name: webstruct
tools.one_line_profile: NER toolkit for HTML data
tools.detailed_description: A library for building Named Entity Recognition systems that operate on HTML data, leveraging structural information for better extraction.

tools.name: TextAnalyzer
tools.one_line_profile: Java-based text analysis library
tools.detailed_description: A Java library providing various text analysis functions including word segmentation, POS tagging, NER, and text classification, primarily for Chinese text.

tools.name: nexmon_csi
tools.one_line_profile: Wi-Fi Channel State Information extraction tool
tools.detailed_description: A firmware patch and toolset for extracting Channel State Information (CSI) from Broadcom Wi-Fi chips, enabling physical layer wireless research and sensing applications.

tools.name: MELBench
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal entity linking datasets and construction framework
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark and dataset construction approach for Multimodal Entity Linking (MEL), including tools for multimodal information extraction and mention/entity extraction from social media and encyclopedias.

tools.name: cross-lingual-open-ie
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-lingual Open Information Extraction model
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Cross-lingual Open Information Extraction using Neural Sequence-to-Sequence Models, enabling information extraction across different languages.

tools.name: BioFLAIR
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical sequence labeling embeddings
tools.detailed_description: Pretrained Pooled Contextualized Embeddings specifically designed for Biomedical Sequence Labeling Tasks, built upon the Flair framework.

tools.name: KegNet
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge Extraction with No Observable Data
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of KegNet (Knowledge Extraction with No Observable Data) from NeurIPS 2019, facilitating knowledge extraction in data-scarce scenarios.

tools.name: trove
tools.one_line_profile: Weakly supervised medical named entity classification
tools.detailed_description: A framework for weakly supervised medical named entity classification, designed to extract medical entities with limited labeled data.

tools.name: Stanza
tools.one_line_profile: Python NLP library for many human languages
tools.detailed_description: A Python natural language analysis package that features a language-agnostic pipeline for tokenization, multi-word token expansion, lemmatization, POS and morphological features tagging, dependency parsing, and named entity recognition.

tools.name: MMORE
tools.one_line_profile: Massive Multimodal Open RAG & Extraction pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A scalable multimodal pipeline for processing, indexing, and querying multimodal documents (PDFs, videos, spreadsheets) to create knowledge bases for LLMs.

tools.name: LocalKnowledgeGraphExtraction
tools.one_line_profile: Unstructured text to Knowledge Graph extractor
tools.detailed_description: A tool to extract Knowledge Graphs from normal, unstructured text and visualize the resulting graph structure.

tools.name: BERT-Event-Extraction
tools.one_line_profile: Event extraction using BERT
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of event extraction tasks using the BERT model, focusing on Chinese language processing.

tools.name: BERT-Relation-Extraction
tools.one_line_profile: Relation triplet extraction using BERT
tools.detailed_description: A tool for extracting relation triplets (subject, predicate, object) from text using BERT-based models.

tools.name: PointerNet_Chinese_Information_Extraction
tools.one_line_profile: Pointer Network for Chinese Information Extraction
tools.detailed_description: Information extraction tool utilizing Pointer Networks for Named Entity Recognition (NER), Relation Extraction, and Event Extraction in Chinese.

tools.name: Qwen2-UIE
tools.one_line_profile: Universal Information Extraction based on Qwen2
tools.detailed_description: A Universal Information Extraction (UIE) implementation based on the Qwen2 model, supporting entity, relation, and event extraction.

tools.name: SpERT_chinese
tools.one_line_profile: Chinese SpERT implementation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of SpERT (Span-based Entity and Relation Transformer) adapted for Chinese relation extraction, capable of jointly extracting entities and relations.

tools.name: chinese_information_extraction
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive Chinese Information Extraction Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for Chinese Information Extraction covering entity extraction, relation extraction, and event extraction tasks.

tools.name: pytorch_bert_event_extraction
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch BERT Event Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based implementation for Chinese event extraction using BERT models.

tools.name: pytorch_uie_ner
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Baidu UIE for NER
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Baidu's Universal Information Extraction (UIE) framework specifically focused on Named Entity Recognition tasks.

tools.name: ner-annotator
tools.one_line_profile: NER Annotation tool for SpaCy
tools.detailed_description: A web-based annotation tool for Named Entity Recognition (NER) that generates training data in JSON format compatible with SpaCy.

tools.name: boundary-aware-nested-ner
tools.one_line_profile: Boundary-aware Nested NER model
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the 'Boundary-aware Neural Model for Nested Named Entity Recognition' (EMNLP 2019), designed to handle nested entity structures.

tools.name: NRE
tools.one_line_profile: C++ toolkit for Neural Relation Extraction with various neural architectures
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for neural relation extraction implementing models like CNN, PCNN, and their attention-based variants. It provides a framework for training and testing relation extraction models on large-scale datasets.

tools.name: OpenNRE
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source package for Neural Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive and extensible toolkit for neural relation extraction (NRE). It supports various models, datasets, and training paradigms, designed to facilitate research and deployment of RE systems.

tools.name: oknlp
tools.one_line_profile: Open and Knowledgeable NLP Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A natural language processing toolkit that integrates knowledge into NLP tasks. It supports Chinese Word Segmentation, POS Tagging, Named Entity Recognition, and Entity Typing.

tools.name: zhopenie
tools.one_line_profile: Chinese Open Information Extraction System
tools.detailed_description: A tree-based triple relation extraction module for Chinese Open Information Extraction (OpenIE). It extracts structured triples from unstructured Chinese text.

tools.name: detecting-scientific-claim
tools.one_line_profile: Scientific claim extraction from biomedical abstracts
tools.detailed_description: A tool powered by AllenNLP for extracting scientific claims (discourse analysis) from biomedical abstracts. It helps in structuring scientific literature for downstream analysis.

tools.name: metastanza
tools.one_line_profile: Standard visualization components for TogoStanza
tools.detailed_description: A collection of generic stanzas (web components) for TogoStanza, a framework used for creating semantic web data visualizations in life sciences (Bioinformatics).

tools.name: SpanMarkerNER
tools.one_line_profile: SpanMarker for Named Entity Recognition
tools.detailed_description: A library for Named Entity Recognition (NER) that uses the SpanMarker architecture. It is compatible with Hugging Face Transformers and provides an easy-to-use interface for training and inference.

tools.name: relationfactory
tools.one_line_profile: End-to-end relation extraction pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for end-to-end relation extraction and knowledge base population. It processes input text to extract entities and relations, suitable for constructing knowledge bases.

tools.name: ClinicalTransformerNER
tools.one_line_profile: Library for clinical named entity recognition
tools.detailed_description: A library for named entity recognition (NER) in the clinical domain, featuring state-of-the-art algorithms tailored for biomedical text processing.

tools.name: MinIE
tools.one_line_profile: Open Information Extraction system
tools.detailed_description: An Open Information Extraction (OpenIE) system that provides compact and semantically rich extractions. It minimizes the output to produce more useful triples for downstream tasks.

tools.name: Underthesea
tools.one_line_profile: Vietnamese NLP Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive NLP toolkit for the Vietnamese language, providing modules for word segmentation, POS tagging, chunking, and named entity recognition (NER).

tools.name: UIE
tools.one_line_profile: Unified Structure Generation for Universal Information Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A unified framework for universal information extraction (UIE) that can model various IE tasks (entity extraction, relation extraction, event extraction, sentiment analysis) as a structure generation problem.

tools.name: GLiNER
tools.one_line_profile: Generalist and Lightweight Model for Named Entity Recognition
tools.detailed_description: A generalist model for Named Entity Recognition (NER) capable of identifying any entity type using a bidirectional transformer encoder. It is designed to be lightweight and effective for zero-shot NER tasks.

tools.name: VnCoreNLP
tools.one_line_profile: Vietnamese natural language processing toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based toolkit for Vietnamese natural language processing, providing a pipeline for word segmentation, POS tagging, named entity recognition (NER), and dependency parsing.

tools.name: GraphGen4Code
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for creating code knowledge graphs
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed to construct knowledge graphs from source code by leveraging WALA for code analysis and extracting information from documentation and forums.

tools.name: Wandora
tools.one_line_profile: Information extraction and knowledge graph management application
tools.detailed_description: A general-purpose application based on Topic Maps and Java for information extraction, knowledge management, and publishing. It supports various data formats and extraction capabilities.

tools.name: YAYI-UIE
tools.one_line_profile: Large language model for unified information extraction
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale pre-trained model fine-tuned on high-quality instruction data for universal information extraction tasks, including named entity recognition and relation extraction.

tools.name: Macropodus
tools.one_line_profile: Chinese natural language processing toolkit
tools.detailed_description: An NLP toolkit based on Albert+BiLSTM+CRF architecture, supporting Chinese word segmentation, POS tagging, named entity recognition (NER), keyword extraction, and text summarization.

tools.name: Pytorch-NLU
tools.one_line_profile: Pytorch-based toolkit for Chinese text classification and sequence labeling
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit supporting multi-class and multi-label text classification, as well as sequence labeling tasks such as Named Entity Recognition (NER) and POS tagging for Chinese text.

tools.name: RIFRE
tools.one_line_profile: Heterogeneous Graph Neural Network model for Joint Entity and Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of the RIFRE model which uses representation iterative fusion on heterogeneous graph neural networks to perform joint entity and relation extraction tasks.

tools.name: kg-baseline-pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch baseline implementation for Joint Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of a baseline model for the 2019 Baidu Relation Extraction competition, focusing on joint relation extraction tasks.

tools.name: DeepEE
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based Event Extraction algorithm gallery
tools.detailed_description: A collection of deep learning algorithms for Chinese event extraction, providing implementations for various models to extract events from text.

tools.name: DeepKE
tools.one_line_profile: Open toolkit for Knowledge Graph Extraction and Construction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive open-source toolkit for knowledge graph extraction and construction, supporting named entity recognition, relation extraction, and attribute extraction with various deep learning models.

tools.name: DocuNet
tools.one_line_profile: Document-level Relation Extraction model treating extraction as semantic segmentation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of DocuNet, a model that approaches document-level relation extraction as a semantic segmentation task to capture global dependencies.

tools.name: IEPile
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale Information Extraction corpus and dataset
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive, large-scale corpus designed for training and evaluating information extraction models, aggregating various IE tasks.

tools.name: KnowPrompt
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge-aware Prompt-tuning framework for Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A framework for relation extraction that utilizes knowledge-aware prompt-tuning with synergistic optimization to improve performance on RE tasks.

tools.name: OneKE
tools.one_line_profile: Schema-guided LLM agent-based knowledge extraction system
tools.detailed_description: A Dockerized system leveraging Large Language Model agents for schema-guided knowledge extraction, designed to automate the IE process.

tools.name: ChineseNER
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network model for Chinese Named Entity Recognition
tools.detailed_description: A neural network-based implementation specifically designed for performing named entity recognition on Chinese text data.

tools.name: Word-Embedding
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of pre-trained word embeddings and training scripts
tools.detailed_description: A resource and toolkit providing access to various pre-trained word embeddings (Word2vec, Fasttext, Glove, BERT, etc.) and scripts for their usage in NLP tasks.

tools.name: OpenNER
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for open-domain Named Entity Recognition
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed to facilitate open-domain named entity recognition tasks, providing models and utilities for extracting entities from diverse text sources.

tools.name: ICDAR-2019-SROIE
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset and benchmark for Scanned Receipts OCR and Information Extraction
tools.detailed_description: The official dataset and evaluation resources for the ICDAR 2019 Robust Reading Challenge on Scanned Receipts OCR and Information Extraction.
